name: @rainstormy/preset-prettier-tailwind
description: A predefined, opinionated Prettier configuration suitable for any web project with Tailwind CSS classes.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-prettier-base: This package provides type definitions for Prettier presets.
dependencies.prettier-plugin-tailwindcss: This Prettier plugin sorts Tailwind CSS classes.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.prettier: Prettier is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/preset-prettier-base`.
